doc:
Jack P. Shepherd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_P._Shepherd 0 Jack Peter Shepherd (born 14 January 1988) is an English actor. He has portrayed the character of David Platt in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street since April 2000. He won the 2018 British Soap Award for Best Actor. Jack_Peter_Shepherd ( born 14_January_1988 ) is an_English_actor . He has_portrayed the_character of David_Platt in the_ITV_soap_opera_Coronation_Street since April_2000 . He won the_2018_British_Soap_Award for_Best_Actor .
